meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e The SaiSiyat people did not know how to weave before.
#c 從前賽夏人不會（用竹架子？）織布。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e It was Kathethel who taught (them) weaving.
#c 據說織衣服是以前雷神教的。
#n 'obay mina rima' 'oemalep 'Obay是要去打獵; mina sa 也可以
#n Note: Obay is going hunting; mina sa is also acceptable.

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e The SaiSiyats go hunting in the woods.
#c 據說賽夏人去 ... ... 獵人去山上。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e Ten persons went hunting. The hunt lasted for one day.
#c 有十個人去打一整天的獵。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e Upon their return, they saw the rice in the pot has been cooked.
#c 回到工寮(沒有人)，卻看見鍋子裡有飯 ... ... 在鍋子裡也有燒好的飯。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e Who came to cook the rice?
#c 就是說這個 ... ... 誰來到山上來煮這頓飯呢？

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e Their workplace is close to the river.
#c 他們在工寮裡，很接近河川。
#n Note 1 : A: hayza ay ka ralom ray ba:la?
#n A: Is there water in the river?
#n Obay fell into a place filed with water.
#n Ataw 的口袋被 Obay 裝水
#n Obay filled Ataw's pocket with water.

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e One of the elders was left to guard the place and watch who would come to cook the rice. The hunters left.
#c 讓一個老人在這裡站崗，看看到底是誰來給獵人煮飯。
#n ka-kita' 注意看 互相看 look at each other
#n IU#22 hini 可用 rini; IU#22 rini is acceptable
#n ya:o miyalawa' hi 'obay 我監視 'Obay; I am checking on 'Obay

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e In the evening, the elder saw a very young lady come out from the sea and saw her cook.
#c 晚上的時候，果真看到一位非常年輕的女子，一下子從海 ... ... 從水裡出來，走來走去燒飯。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e When the lady finished cooking, she prepared to leave.
#c (那位女子)煮完了，準備要跑回去時，
#n minaSoka' hi 'obay 'am lobih ila taew'an Obay準備要回去了嗎?

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e The elder blocked her way and she was not able to pass through.
#c 老人用標槍擋住, (她就)無法通過那個。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e The elder talked to her and asked her where she was from.
#c 老人跟她談話, 問她從哪裡來。
#n yao kayngi' maeraehrang ki sia 我不要跟他商量
#n yao kayngi' maeraehrang nisia 我不要替他商量
#n I don't want to discuss with him.
#n I don't want to discuss for him.

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e At night, the hunters returned home.

free: #e The dog arrived home ahead and wagged its tail.

free: #e The lady broke out laughing and agreed to talk.
#c 那小姑娘笑了。大家跟她商量，她就答應了。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e (She kept asking) I am still young.

free: #e My father instructed me to teach people how to weave.
#c 我爸爸叫我去教編織的方法。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e The hunters wanted a young man to marry the young lady.
#c 打獵的人回來，談論說，這個小姐和年輕的男生，要讓他們結婚。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e The young man who has not yet married agreed to get married with her.

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e It has been a long time after they got married.

高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e After getting married for a long time, the woman asked to go home to her parents' house.
#c 結婚後很久，想要回娘家。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e Her husband wanted to go with her.
#c 那個年輕人也要跟著去。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e They saw her beautiful house under the water.
#c 看到在水裡有很漂亮的家。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e The woman had weaved many kinds of clothes for she knew how to weave. The man said he liked girls who knew how to weave.
#c 那女人已經織了很多衣服, 因為她知道如何編織。(那男生)說我很欣賞很會編織的年輕女孩子。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e It would have been good if the SaiSiyat people learned to weave.
#c 賽夏族假如會編織的話是最好不過。

meta.speaker: 高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5
高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e They returned to the SaiSiyat tribe.

free: #e And she taught them how to weave.

高德盛, parain a oemaw, male, 1928-1-5

free: #e She taught the first batch of weavers and they learned how to weave.
#c 先教編織法, 有很多人學會了。
